Articles.Content:
I read in this post that Kerbalism and Interstellar have a problem with megajoules being blocked from being used. There was a comment saying it was fixed.

However, after updating everything to latest released versions, I still have that problem. I can't turn on any supply of megajoules, so anything that uses them also doesn't function.

And I can confirm, after removing only the Kerbalism mod, the megajoule lock is gone and everything works great, so this was never fixed then?

Is this fixable in a config file somewhere?

Edited May 16, 2023 by alwayskerbal
